description: Manage a function app's scale configuration.

commands.name: az functionapp scale config set
commands.summary: Update an existing function app's scale configuration.
examples: az functionapp scale config set --name MyFunctionApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --instance-memory 2048
az functionapp scale config set --name MyFunctionApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --maximum-instance-count 5
az functionapp scale config set --name MyFunctionApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --trigger-type http --trigger-settings perInstanceConcurrency=1

commands.name: az functionapp scale config show
commands.summary: Get the details of a function app's scale configuration.
examples: az functionapp scale config show --name MyFunctionApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup
